title: Care free living on demand!
posting_body: Text ID # 1279C to my cell for more info!

Live better at  Austin North Lamar  – a brand new, state-of-the-art residential community featuring stylish apartments, resort amenities, and a friendly service team right in the heart of North Austin.

Choose from studio, 1, 2 & 3 bedroom floor plans with thoughtfully appointed finishes and contemporary interior amenities featuring kitchens with islands, stainless steel appliances, and undermount sinks, spa-inspired bathrooms, private washer/dryer in residence, and premium wood-style flooring in the kitchen and living areas.
Select apartments boast walk-in closets and private patio/balconies.

Enjoy ultimate carefree living with on-demand, convenience amenities right at home featuring a resort pool and sundeck, state-of-the-art fitness center, social paseos, a rooftop lounge with downtown views, a pet spa, and much more.
North Austin is a great place to live, work, and play!
Our community is located in the Crestview neighborhood, convenient to the hottest, family-owned restaurants, breweries, boutiques, health and fitness studios, and coffee shops.
Commuting to Austin employers is a breeze with our easy access to highways 35 and 183.
We’re also footsteps from Crestview Station, which is located along the Red Line providing service from Leander to Downtown with stops at UT-Austin and The Domain.
